channel.title: Project Overdose
channel.description:
[center]Project Overdose is a project i have recently started, it is based on project insanity but i have spent time inproving on the core. It Runs on hyperions game engine and task system. I estimate it could atleast hold 90 players without lag. If it has a good vps backing it up it could hold more. It also consists of a custom map i have put much work into.
I really dont care how good you are at coding, im looking for creative people. I currently need [b]Graphic designer, sprite designer (good at making small symbols) and possibly another java coder[/b].
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2uehe0k.png[/img]
application:
[code] Age: MSN: Past Work: Time Available: Time Zone: [/code][/center]

item.title: Project Overdose
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Note. I’m not trying to argue or anything, but PI’s can hold A LOT more players then people assume. Hope we didn’t get off on the wrong foot.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Overdose
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“iz3 legend, post:7, topic:415059”]Im going to be honest, i really dont care. I’ll improve it again when i have 90 players on it.

I just checked it, all the skills you “re-wrote” where simple as hell…[/quote]Never said they weren’t easy. All i said was to check the players online… And the skills work 1 million times better.

Read full topic
